full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 Los Angeles, JULY 18, 1978 TO :- Police Department Coral Springs Florida 33065 FROM : Truong Van Tinh 1067 W. 26th St., Apt. 2, San Pedro, California 90731 SUBJECT: Request for Police Clearance Dear Sir: I, undersigned the following names NAMES D.0.3 ALIEN # SS# 1. TRUONG VAN TINH 3-4-1915 A21294604 586-32-0564 2. TRAN THI KIM NGOC 6-1-1916 A21294605 586-32-0575 3. 4. 5. FOIA (b)(6) 6. 7. 8. 9. 10. previously residing at 10840 N.W., 37 Ct., Coral Springs FLA. 33065 from May 1, 1975 to August 1976 The above clearance is requested by the Immigration and Naturalization ser in connection with my applicants to adjust status from refugee to that of Permanent Resident Alien Please expedite. 7-25-78 BASED ON A SEARCH IN OUR ARREST CARD FILES REVEALS Sincerely, NO ARREST ON THE ABOVE MENTIONED SUBJECTS, Throug r thuh BECKY MADSEN, COURT CLERK CORAL SPRINGS POLICE DEPARTMENT
